titles.title: For the relief of Fouad Yousef Hakim Mansour and Saheir Gamil Shaker Mansour.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/7/2005--Introduced. Declares Fouad Yousef Hakim Mansour and Saheir Gamil Shaker Mansour each to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
